languages.text: Снедаемый загадками собственного происхождения, предательства и наследия архимагоса Амарната, Паскаль не мог отыскать покоя. Спустя несколько лет он был обнаружен в корабельной технокапелле, задушенный собственными мехадендритами. Было ли это результатом умышленного внедрения в его разум мусорного кода или же безумия — неизвестно.

Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.
languages.original_text: Снедаемый загадками собственного происхождения, предательства и наследия архимагоса Амарната, Паскаль не мог отыскать покоя. Спустя несколько лет он был обнаружен в корабельной технокапелле, задушенный собственными мехадендритами. Было ли это результатом умышленного внедрения в его разум мусорного кода или же безумия — неизвестно.

traits.locale_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origin, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. Several years passed, and he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Was it a result of the deliberate planting of scrap-code into his mind or a plain madness, nobody knows.

Tortured by the mysteries of his origin, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. Several years passed, and he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Was it a result of the deliberate planting of scrap-code into his mind or a plain madness, nobody knows.

Tortured by the mysteries of his origin, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted into his mind, or he simply went mad, nobody knows.

Tortured by the mysteries of his origin, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted into his mind, or he simply went mad, nobody knows.

Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

languages.text: 出身的谜团、他人的背叛，以及大贤者阿玛纳特的遗产，这一切每时每刻都在折磨着帕斯卡，让他无法获得安宁。几年之后，人们发现他死在了飞船的技术礼拜堂里，被自己的机械触须勒死了。是他的思想中被刻意植入了废码？还是说，他仅仅是发了疯？没人知道这究竟是怎么回事。
languages.original_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

traits.locale_text: 出身的谜团、他人的背叛，以及大贤者阿玛纳特的遗产，这一切每时每刻都在折磨着帕斯卡，让他无法获得安宁。几年之后，人们发现他死在了飞船的技术礼拜堂里，被自己的机械触须勒死了。是他的思想中被刻意植入了废码？还是说，他仅仅是发了疯？没人知道这究竟是怎么回事。

languages.text: Pasqal peinigten viele Dinge: Das Rätsel seiner Herkunft, Verrat und das Vermächtnis von Erzmagos Amarnat. Er konnte keinen Frieden finden. Nach einigen Jahren wurde er tot in der Techkapelle des Schiffs aufgefunden, von seinen eigenen Mechadendriten erdrosselt. Niemand weiß, ob bewusst Schadcode in seinen Verstand eingepflanzt worden war oder ob er einfach den Verstand verloren hatte.
languages.original_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal peinigten viele Dinge: Das Rätsel seiner Herkunft, Verrat und das Vermächtnis von Erzmagos Amarnat. Er konnte keinen Frieden finden. Nach einigen Jahren wurde er tot in der Techkapelle des Schiffs aufgefunden, von seinen eigenen Mechadendriten erdrosselt. Niemand weiß, ob bewusst Schadcode in seinen Verstand eingepflanzt worden war oder ob er einfach den Verstand verloren hatte.

languages.text: Torturé par le mystère de ses origines, par sa trahison et par l'héritage de l'archimagos Amarnat, Pasqal ne parvint jamais à trouver la paix. Plusieurs années plus tard, on le retrouva mort dans la technochapelle du vaisseau, étranglé par ses propres mécadendrites. Personne ne sut jamais si un anticode avait été implanté dans son esprit ou s'il avait simplement perdu la raison.
languages.original_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

traits.locale_text: Torturé par le mystère de ses origines, par sa trahison et par l'héritage de l'archimagos Amarnat, Pasqal ne parvint jamais à trouver la paix. Plusieurs années plus tard, on le retrouva mort dans la technochapelle du vaisseau, étranglé par ses propres mécadendrites. Personne ne sut jamais si un anticode avait été implanté dans son esprit ou s'il avait simplement perdu la raison.

languages.text: Torturado por los misterios de su origen, la traición y el legado del Archimagos Amarnat, Pasqal no pudo encontrar la paz. Tras unos años, apareció muerto en la tecnocapilla de la nave, estrangulado por sus propias mecadendritas. Nadie sabe si alguien implantó código chatarra en su mente o si simplemente se volvió loco.
languages.original_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

traits.locale_text: Torturado por los misterios de su origen, la traición y el legado del Archimagos Amarnat, Pasqal no pudo encontrar la paz. Tras unos años, apareció muerto en la tecnocapilla de la nave, estrangulado por sus propias mecadendritas. Nadie sabe si alguien implantó código chatarra en su mente o si simplemente se volvió loco.

languages.text: 自分の出自、裏切り、大賢人アマルナトの遺産の謎に苦しめられ、パスカルは安らぎを得ることができなかった。数年後、彼は船の技術礼拝堂で自分の機械触手に絞め殺された死体で発見された。破壊コードが意図的に彼の心に植えつけられたのか、単に気が狂ったのかは誰にもわからない。
languages.original_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

traits.locale_text: 自分の出自、裏切り、大賢人アマルナトの遺産の謎に苦しめられ、パスカルは安らぎを得ることができなかった。数年後、彼は船の技術礼拝堂で自分の機械触手に絞め殺された死体で発見された。破壊コードが意図的に彼の心に植えつけられたのか、単に気が狂ったのかは誰にもわからない。

languages.text: Kökenlerine dair gizemler, ihanetler ve Başmagos Amarnat'ın mirası nedeniyle kedere boğulan Pasqal hiçbir zaman huzur bulamadı. Birkaç yıl sonra geminin tekno şapelinde ölü bulundu. Kendi mekadentritleri tarafından boğulmuştu. Hurda kodu zihnine kasıtlı olarak mı yerleştirildi yoksa bunu delirdiği için mi yaptı, kimse bilmiyor.
languages.original_text: Tortured by the mysteries of his origins, betrayal, and the legacy of Archmagos Amarnat, Pasqal could not find peace. After several years, he was found dead in the ship's tech-chapel, strangled by his own mechadendrites. Whether scrap-code was deliberately planted in his mind, or he simply went mad, no one knows.

traits.locale_text: Kökenlerine dair gizemler, ihanetler ve Başmagos Amarnat'ın mirası nedeniyle kedere boğulan Pasqal hiçbir zaman huzur bulamadı. Birkaç yıl sonra geminin tekno şapelinde ölü bulundu. Kendi mekadentritleri tarafından boğulmuştu. Hurda kodu zihnine kasıtlı olarak mı yerleştirildi yoksa bunu delirdiği için mi yaptı, kimse bilmiyor.
